title: The Ladies' man; Lord Byron lived here; The Lift
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television programs - Great Britain
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television series
abstract: The Ladies man (1960)--Lord Byron lived here (1959)--The Lift (1961)
description: Episode of Series "Hancock's half hour". Three episodes from the British television comedy series "Hancock" starring Tony Hancock. 1. The Ladies man: Hancock decides to take things into his own hands and improve his success rate with the opposite sex. 2. Lord Byron lives here: The discovery of scribblings by the great poet Byron leads Hancock to open his house as a stately home, exploit the American tourists and make a fortune at the same time. The Lift: What a captive audience has top put up with when Hancock tips the balance of one too many in the lift and the lift won't budge.
related_objects: Series; S01124; Hancock's half hour; Active; 1956
